PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-04491999-03-180,  HERITAGE,  PSC,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the (a) PUBLIC SERVICE OFFICIAL LANGUAGES EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER and to the (b) PUBLIC SERVICE OFFICIAL LANGUAGES APPOINTMENT REGULATIONS - whereby candidates for non-imperative bilingual positions in the CAREER ASSIGNMENT PROGRAM would not have to demonstrate their potential to attain the required proficiency in the other official language through government-financed training, effective March 31, 1999.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0135 Publication Date: 1999-03-31
Attachments
